short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a context menu option to save Twitter images as PNG.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a context menu option to save Twitter images as PNG. (Only enabled in twitter/x).

A more detailed description with examples can be found on the GitHub page of this project:

- https://github.com/1Git2Clone/twitter-img-downloader

This project is licensed under the MIT license and its code is open to the publicly accessible on GitHub, you may view it at any time.
